name: CVB Financial Corp.
description: CVB Financial Corp. is the holding company for Citizens Business Bank, a full-service bank headquartered in Ontario, California. Established in 1974, CVB Financial has grown to become one of the largest and most reputable banks in California, providing a wide range of banking services designed to meet the needs of individuals, businesses, and communities. The bank specializes in commercial banking, offering products such as commercial real estate loans, business loans, and treasury management services. In addition to commercial banking, CVB Financial Corp. provides personal banking services, including checking and savings accounts, mortgages, and investment services. The company is committed to community involvement and sustainable practices, emphasizing the importance of building long-lasting relationships with its clients and contributing to the economic development of the regions it serves. With a strong focus on customer service and a dedication to innovation, CVB Financial continues to expand its footprint in the banking industry while maintaining its values of integrity and excellence.
